welcome_message_body: "Welcome to IJsselstein, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning architecture! We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Schiphol Airport, dedicated to long-haul flights and international carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
